example.eg: This park is one of my favourite places.
example.egtrans: 这公园是我最喜欢的地方之一。

example.eg: She lost her place in the queue.
example.egtrans: 她把队伍位置给排丢了。

example.eg: There's always a place for you in this house.
example.egtrans: 这个家里总有你能住的地方。

example.eg: All the children were in their places.
example.egtrans: 所有孩子都各就各位。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 指定的位置, 合适的位置

example.eg: Are there any places left for tonight's concert?
example.egtrans: 今晚的音乐会还有位子吗？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 座位, 位子, 席位

example.eg: You should bookmark your place in the novel.
example.egtrans: 小说读到哪里，你就该在那里插上书签。

example.eg: He sent a delegate to attend the ceremony in his place.
example.egtrans: 他派代表替他出席了典礼。

example.eg: Shall we go to my place or yours?
example.egtrans: 我们去我那儿还是上你那儿？

example.eg: This is not the right place to discuss politics.
example.egtrans: 这个场合不适合讨论政治。

example.eg: How many places do we need at the table?
example.egtrans: 我们该在饭桌上摆几个位置？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 空位, 座位, 席位

example.eg: People can't agree on the place of science in theology.
example.egtrans: 对于科学在神学中的作用，人们意见不一。

example.eg: He should remember his place in society and stop causing trouble.
example.egtrans: 我不希望向你一样活着，但是我没有权利来评判。

example.eg: She marked out a place in the sand and sat down to sunbathe.
example.egtrans: 她在沙滩上划出一片区域，坐下开始日光浴。

example.eg: She won second place in the competition.
example.egtrans: 她在比赛中获得第二名。

example.eg: I'm looking for a place in a publishing house.
example.egtrans: 我正在寻找出版社职位。

example.eg: They live on Harlow Place.
The payoff is for win, place and show.
example.egtrans: 只有赛马的第一名、第二名和第三名才能获得报酬。

dsense.name: place⇒
dsense.guideword: (race horse: finish in given position) (赛马)

example.eg: My horse placed third and I won two hundred dollars.

dsense.name: place
dsense.guideword: (horse race: finish in first three) (赛马)

example.eg: My horse didn't even place.
example.egtrans: 我的马都没有取得名次。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 取得名次, 跻身前三名

example.eg: Where did your horse place?
example.egtrans: 你的马比赛成绩如何？

example.eg: He placed the book on the shelf.
example.egtrans: 他把书放到了架子上。

example.eg: His action placed her in danger.
The child was placed with a family in another city.
I would place him in the top ten players of all time.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 对…排名, 对…进行排位

example.eg: She placed vases of flowers in the dining room.
Place the books in chronological order.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 摆放, 放置, 排放

example.eg: They placed her in one of the country's finest schools.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 送…就读, 让...上（学校等）

example.eg: The job agency placed him almost immediately.
They placed him as head of the new sales team.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 任命...为, 指定...为, 委派...做

example.eg: An anachronism is something placed in a period to which it does not belong.
You only have a minute left to place your bet.
Shall I place the call for you?
I'd like to place an order for a dozen more items.

dsense.name: place [sth]
dsense.guideword: (sport: kick or hit ball) (体育运动)

example.eg: He placed the ball in the upper right corner of the net.
This actor looks very familiar but I just can't place him.
example.egtrans: 这个男演员看起来很眼熟，不过我就是认不出来。

dsense.name: place [sth] in [sth]
dsense.guideword: (put: an ad in a newspaper) (在报纸上登广告)

example.eg: The couple needed a cleaner, so they placed an ad in the local paper.
There is dust all over the place; I really need to clean house!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 到处都是, 各处都是

example.eg: I have been very distracted lately; my thoughts are all over the place.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 精力分散的, 分心的

example.eg: I would rather be any place but here right now.

dsense.name: anyplace, any place
dsense.guideword: US (anywhere: in, at, to any place)

example.eg: I use the navigation system to guide me when I'm driving anyplace.

dsense.name: anyplace, any place
dsense.guideword: US (with negative: not in, at, to any place) (表否定)

example.eg: Where did I put my keys? I can't find them any place.

dsense.name: be in a bad place, be in a dark place
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (be in a poor state of mind, unhappy)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不开心, 糟糕的心情

dsense.name: be in a good place, be in a happy place
between the devil and the deep blue sea, between a rock and a hard place, between Scylla and Charybdis

trans_examp.trans_cn: 处于两难境地, 左右为难

example.eg: My dog's burial place is right next to his favourite tree.
Round these values so that they are correct to two decimal places.
I managed first place in the last race, despite a bad start.
A laptop is very useful when you're going from place to place.
The market square was a gathering place for local people every Saturday.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 聚会场所, 聚会地点

example.eg: Isolated, barren Howland Island is a godforsaken place.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 荒凉地, 偏僻的地方, 鸟不生蛋的地方

example.eg: Get me out of this godforsaken place!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 破破烂烂的地方, 沉闷的地方

example.eg: Meat has its place in a healthy diet, but reducing the amount consumed has additional benefits.

dsense.name: have your heart in the right place

trans_examp.trans_cn: 出发点是好的, 初衷是好的

example.eg: Let's go to my secret hiding place, okay?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 藏匿之处, 藏身的地方

example.eg: Please show respect as this church is a holy place.
The burglar put the bracelet back in its place.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在其（适当的或应当的）位置, 有其应有的地位

example.eg: The artist ensures that all his equipment is in place before he begins a new painting.
example.egtrans: 画家把所有工具准备就绪，就开始作一幅画。

example.eg: The dog stayed in place until his owner called him.
example.egtrans: 在主人叫唤它前，这只狗一直待在原来的位置。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 就位地, 在恰当的位置, 在原来的位置

example.eg: You can use tinned tomatoes in place of fresh ones in this recipe.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 代替某物, 取代某物

example.eg: He sent a delegate to attend the ceremony in his place.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 代替某人, 取代某人

example.eg: Why don't I like him? Well, in the first place, he doesn't wash.
example.egtrans: 我为什么不喜欢他？好吧，首先，他不洗澡。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 首先, 原本, 本来

example.eg: Why didn't you tell me that in the first place?
example.egtrans: 你为什么最开始没有告诉我？

example.eg: Villa was brought on halfway through the game in the place of Torres.
In the first place, flying is expensive, and in the second place, the airport is a long distance away.
There is nothing in this place I like, let's go somewhere else.
In your place, I would be just as confused.
Learning the alphabet is a good jumping off point for children who wish to learn how to read.
We need to agree on a meeting place before the concert begins.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 聚会地点, 集合地点
不欢迎, 没有…的位置

example.eg: As the only Europeans present, we felt a little out of place.
We asked an estate agent to place a value on our house.
You cannot place a value on good health.
Please call the Chinese restaurant and place an order for hot and sour soup.
example.egtrans: 请给中餐馆打电话，并下一份酸辣汤的订单。

dsense.name: place card
dsense.guideword: (guest's name card at dinner table) (标有客人姓名)

dsense.name: place kicker, placekicker
dsense.guideword: (American football: player who kicks goals) (橄榄球运动中的)

example.eg: We don't have enough place mats to properly set the table.
The study of place names is called toponymy.
Many people never travel far from their place of birth.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 营业场所，经营场所，营业地点

example.eg: The cops went to the suspect's place of residence and served a search warrant.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 工作地点，工作场所，工作单位

example.eg: People should be free to choose their own place of worship.
Before the grandchildren arrive, I must place these biscuits out of sight!

dsense.name: place setting
dsense.guideword: (table service: mat, cutlery, etc.) (进餐前放在进餐者面前)

example.eg: The table's big enough for six place settings.
Place yourself behind the line for the picture.
With eyes closed, place yourself in a happy place.
The coder used a placeholder until the actual values were decided on.
A placeholder was appointed until the next elections are held.

dsense.name: placeholder
dsense.guideword: (symbol: can be replaced by number) (数学术语)

example.eg: We will use placeholders since we do not know the exact values yet.
Placeholders are often important for grammatical structure.
Add a placeholder to the calendar so people know the proposed time for the meeting.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 暂时预订, 临时预订

example.eg: We went to our polling place to cast our ballots.
Navid's trophy was given pride of place on the mantelpiece.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 最显著的位置, 最高的位置

example.eg: The school has put measures in place to ensure no stranger can gain access to the building.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 实施, 施行, 落实

example.eg: Eleanor's sharp rebuke put Daniel in his place.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 放在正确的地方, 使归位

example.eg: Yesterday we carried Grandma to her final resting place.
My favourite resting place is my conservatory.
Ruth was in second place in the competition.
I knew so much about my job that nobody could take my place.
The concert took place in a bar.  The next election in my village will take place on April 6th.
example.egtrans: 那场音乐会在一间酒吧举行。我村子的下一场选举将会在4月6日举行。

example.eg: Nothing takes the place of money in our society.

dsense.name: there is a time and a place for everything, there is a time and place for everything

trans_examp.trans_cn: 凡事要讲究时间和场合

example.eg: Coming to this place for vacation was the best decision I have ever made.

dsense.name: watering place, watering hole, waterhole, water hole

example.eg: On safari animals can often be seen coming down to the watering hole.

dsense.name: watering place, watering hole, watering spot

example.eg: We found the drunk at his usual watering hole.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 卖酒的地方, 卖酒处, 卖酒处
